conversation.text: I'm in the mood for a thriller movie. Could you recommend a few?

conversation.speaker: SYSTEM
conversation.text: I think I've got just the thing for you! Have you considered "The Glass House" (2001)? It's a psychological thriller that explores themes of deception and manipulation, with a standout performance from Trevor Morgan as the orphaned teenager who discovers his new parents aren't what they seem. The tension builds quickly, keeping you on the edge of your seat until the very end!

conversation.text:
I think you'll really enjoy "Jack Reacher"! The movie's intense and suspenseful, following a homicide investigator as he digs into a mass shooting case that gets complicated by a trained military sniper's motives. Tom Cruise brings his signature action hero vibe to the title role, and the plot is full of twists and turns.

If you're in the mood for something a bit more cerebral, "Transcendence" could be right up your alley. This sci-fi thriller explores the ethics of artificial intelligence when a scientist's consciousness is uploaded into one such program - it's got some great performances from Johnny Depp and Morgan Freeman!

With Tom Cruise leading the charge and plenty of twists and turns, it's a wild ride from start to finish!
